dotnetType.name: Int16ResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Int16" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Int16" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves short (16-bit signed integer) type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Int16ResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
